fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
Only up to four members may exist.
Factional chat
No factional kill unless no Killing members are alive.
Members' X-Ray attributes are unlocked if they are the last living member.
If exactly one Kombatant and one non-Kombatant are alive, the game ends in the Kombatant victory.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Konquer the town and prove your worth

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Konquer the town and prove your worth
